meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! Get ready for some radical reviews of Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1 + 2!

As I dove into this groovy remaster, I couldn’t help but feel like a kid again, re-experiencing the thrill of shredding gnarly rails and performing sweet tricks. But before I get too stoked, let me give you the lowdown from some of the top critics in the business.

IGN: "This is such a tremendous turnaround from 2015's disastrously dismal Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 5 that it’s difficult to believe they share even a shred of DNA." - Okay, so maybe I'm being a little harsh on THPS5, but who doesn't love a good ol' school comeback story?

GameSpot: "Because it nails so much about that original Tony Hawk experience, it's really hard to be mad at Pro Skater 1 + 2 for any of its downsides." - Agreed! When something's this close to the original, it's hard not to love.

Game Informer: "Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1 and 2 makes the experience of playing through these games again feel fresh and current." - Fresh and current? Sounds like a sweet combo to me!

Gaming Age: "Tony Hawk Pro Skater 1 and 2 is easily one of the best remasters available on the market today..." - High praise indeed! When remasters get it right, they can be pure magic.

Worth Playing: "It has trimmed most of the fat that's typical of these projects and unapologetically focused on its original core experience, and the results are all the better for it." - Less is more, I always say!

Cheat Code Central: "Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1+2 is a perfect remaster. It feels the way you expect the game to..." - Perfect? That's some serious flattery right there! Who wouldn't want their game to be considered perfect?

SpazioGames: "Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1+2 is a title that manages to be incredibly nostalgic, but it's a modern experience at the same time." - Nostalgic and new? What more could you ask for?

And there you have it – a rad review roundup from some of the most tubular critics out there! Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1 + 2 is an absolute blast to play, and whether you're a seasoned pro or a new-school shredder, this game's got something for everyone. So grab your board and get ready to ride the rails – it's time to get your skate on!
